mapper.insert: insert into sys_remind_rule (rule_id, advance_days, is_same_day, overdue_days, remind_type, send_obj, remind_topic, remind_tpl, remind_level, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{ruleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{advanceDays,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSameDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{overdueDays,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remindType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendObj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remindTopic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remindTpl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remindLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select rule_id, advance_days, is_same_day, overdue_days, remind_type, send_obj, remind_topic, remind_tpl, remind_level, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_remind_rule where rule_id = #{ruleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by time_stamp desc

select rule_id, advance_days, is_same_day, overdue_days, remind_type, send_obj, remind_topic, remind_tpl, remind_level, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_remind_rule order by time_stamp desc
